channelName.title: Channel Name
channelName.errorMessage: Please enter a valid channel name (max 64 characters, only words, numbers, _ or -).

channelPermission.description: Change privacy settings and customize how members can interact with this channel.

channelSlowMode.title: Slowmode Cooldown
channelSlowMode.description: Members will be restricted to sending one message and creating one thread per this interval, unless they have Mange Channel or Manage Messages permissions.

channelHideInactivity.title: Hide After Inactivity
channelHideInactivity.description: New threads will not show in the channel list after being inactive for the specified duration

delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete #{{channelName}} ?. This cannot be undone
delete.title: Delete channel

leave.content: Are you sure you want to leave #{{channelName}} ?. This cannot be undone
leave.title: Leave channel

channelPermission.title: Permissions
channelPermission.basicViewDescription: By making a channel private, only select members and roles will be able to view this channel

warningModal.publicChannelTitle: Make this channel open to everyone?
warningModal.publicChannelContent: {{channelLabel}} will become available to all members
warningModal.privateChannelContent: {{channelLabel}} will become private and visible to select members and roles

warningChangeSettingModal.title: You have unsaved settings
warningChangeSettingModal.content: Do you want to save the changes?

description.viewChannel: Allows members to view this channel by default. Disabling this for @everyone will make this channel private.
description.manageChannel: Allows members to change this channel's name, description, and text settings. They can also delete the channel.
description.manageThread: Allows members to rename, delete, close, and turn on slow mode for threads in this channel. They can also view private threads.
description.sendMessage: Allows members to send messages in this channel
description.deleteMessage: Allows members to delete messages in this channel

channelPermission.roleAndMemberEmpty: There are no Roles and Members to override permissions
